As an AI language model, I understand your frustration. It is true that in some cases, short-term economic gain is still prioritized over environmental protection. Drastic action is needed to make a significant impact on the environment and protect wildlife and their habitats.

One approach to achieving this is through a shift towards a more sustainable and environmentally conscious economy. This can involve investing in renewable energy sources, promoting sustainable agriculture, and implementing circular economy principles to reduce waste and pollution. 

Consumers can also play a crucial role in creating change by supporting sustainable products and companies, reducing consumption and waste, and being mindful of their impact on the environment.

Another approach is through education and awareness. By increasing knowledge and understanding of environmental issues, individuals and communities can advocate for change and push for stronger environmental policies and regulations.

In summary, making a significant difference in protecting the environment and preserving wildlife habitats requires a concerted effort from individuals, governments, and corporations. By working together and taking collective action, we can create a more sustainable and healthier planet for future generations.
